channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Atomicwork gets backing from Khosla for its AI alternative to old-school IT software like ServiceNow
item.description: Atomicwork has raised $25 million in a Series A round co-led by Khosla Ventures and Z47 to expand its AI agentic platform for enterprises. © 2024 Tech...

item.title: Microsoft tests ‘scareware blocker’ for Edge that uses computer vision to detect scams
item.description: Microsoft is rolling out a new tool dubbed “scareware blocker,” which uses machine learning and computer vision to identify a very pervasive type of o...

item.title: 50% Off Home Chef Promo Code and Coupons
item.description: Enjoy up to 50% off deliveries, free meals, and more with the latest Home Chef coupons.

item.title: Zepto shifts HQ to India as local listings gain appeal
item.description: Quick-commerce startup Zepto has moved its domicile to India from Singapore, joining a growing number of Indian startups that have moved their headqua...

item.title: Ninja Crispi Review: An Ingenious Portable Air Fryer
item.description: This new Ninja Crispi portable air fryer may be the new best solution to potlucks, office lunch, and maybe tailgating.

item.title: DeepSeek’s New AI Model Sparks Shock, Awe, and Questions From US Competitors

item.title: Helion raises $425M to help build a fusion reactor for Microsoft
item.description: Helion's unorthodox approach to fusion power and relative secrecy has earned it plenty of fans — and critics. But don’t count its investors among the ...

item.title: Are You Lonely? Adopt a New Family on Facebook Today
item.description: A goat farmer in rural Minnesota, estranged from her biological children, finds new purpose as a surrogate grandparent.

item.title: TravelPerk raises $200M as valuation nearly doubles to $2.7B

item.title: Bookshop.org Now Sells Ebooks
